p: Over the period of 40 years, the duration of the SEI displays a similar tendency of rise ( Figure 7). This is true for all the points under consideration, but there is a marked variation between them. During the same given year, the difference may be up to 37 days. The SEI is longer in Moscow city than at the periphery, and longer in the eastern and southern parts of the Moscow oblastâ€™ than elsewhere. At the same time, the rate of increase in the duration of the season is more significant in its western and southwestern parts.
